name: Prince Ajapanadam x Princess
description:
This is a simple semi-nsfw themed JRPG. This JRPG is created using RPG Maker MZ. This JRPG is very short and can be completed in less than 30 minutes, emphasizing the story element of saving several kingdoms. The player is given an unlimited power, money and inventory. All of that, so the players can only enjoy the story elements in it. intended for casual gamers.

Story

Prince Anihonhiko, the prince from modern kingdom Ajapanadam alongside with his wife, princess Akorea-Aca from modern kingdom Akoreaeve got isekaid into medieval isekai world from their modern world. This isekai world got attacked by demon queen, Prince Anihonhiko and Princess Akorea-Aca decided to save all princesses.

Features

RPG battle turn based
Adventure up to 6 kingdom (each kingdom have 1 town & 1 castle with the interior and NPC. only items shop and weapon shop all pruchases able for player)
Casual (Easy Mode, only focus on story)
